verses.name: Deuteronomy 25:15
verses.text: But thou shalt have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure shalt thou have: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 25:16
verses.text: For all that do such things, and all that do unrighteously, are an abomination unto the Lord thy God.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 25:17
verses.text: Remember what Amalek did unto thee by the way, when ye were come forth out of Egypt;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 25:18
verses.text: How he met thee by the way, and smote the hindmost of thee, even all that were feeble behind thee, when thou wast faint and weary; and he feared not God.
